meanings.sent1: The bin for nonrecyclables was overflowing with trash.
meanings.sent2: We need to properly dispose of the nonrecyclables to reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: The nonrecyclables decided to have a party in the landfill.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a sea of nonrecyclables, impossible to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the nonrecyclables lingered in the air, reminding us to recycle more.

meanings.definition: Materials that are not able to be recycled.
meanings.sent1: Sorting out the nonrecyclables from the recyclables can be challenging.
meanings.sent2: The landfill was filled with nonrecyclables that could not be processed.
meanings.sent3: The nonrecyclables tried to sneak into the recycling bin, thinking they could pass as recyclable.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a pile of nonrecyclables, heavy and burdensome.
meanings.sent5: The nonrecyclables piled up in the corner, waiting to be disposed of properly.
